Length: Simple - Little or no package information is known apart from physical size.|2R if the thermal resistance between junction and board and junction and case are known
If the component type is Simple then this material will give an approximate indication of the predominant construction material.
If True then the component's power will be smeared over the entire board surface. This is appropriate for small components and results in quicker thermal solution times.
If True then the component is removed from view and takes no part in the solution.

Simple Card Slot - A basic definition of an individual slot in a sub-rack | Standard Still Air - A generic still air environment | Standard Forced Air - A generic wind tunnel type environment | Conduction Cooled - To represent the affect of fixing the board and/or components to a chassis at a fixed temperature | Reflow Oven - A generic reflow oven environment
